summary: This document is a U.S. Customs and Border Protection (CBP) automated notification email indicating that Jeffrey Epstein's lookout record was queried and viewed by a user from ICE-PARIS, ATTACHE on July 5, 2019. It shows law enforcement monitoring of Epstein's travel profile shortly before his arrest.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The individual whose TECS lookout record (P3N06596100A01) was accessed by a user from ICE-PARIS, ATTACHE on July 5, 2019.

events.title: Epstein TECS Record Query by ICE-Paris
events.description: A user from ICE-PARIS, ATTACHE accessed Jeffrey Epstein's Person Lookout Query record (P3N06596100A01) in the TECS system.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was the subject of an active TECS (Treasury Enforcement Communications System) Person Lookout Query record with ID P3N06596100A01.
Epstein's record was queried and viewed by a user from the U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) attach√© office in Paris on July 5, 2019.
The query occurred at 02:09:33 EDT, indicating international law enforcement monitoring of Epstein's travel profile.
This activity took place just days before Epstein's arrest on July 6, 2019, suggesting coordinated investigative efforts.
